about_the_game:
The Nightmare Begins is a survival horror game set in a richly detailed steampunk world. Players take on the role of an experienced supernatural detective tasked with unraveling a series of enigmatic events and sinister cases that plague a dark and immersive city.

The game features meticulously designed environments, ranging from decaying streets to ancient, crumbling buildings, each brimming with atmospheric tension. As you explore these locales, you will uncover hidden clues, solve intricate puzzles, and face off against a variety of supernatural threats in strategic combat.

The Nightmare Begins combines intense exploration, challenging puzzles, and strategic combat with a crucial item management mechanic. Players must carefully manage and transport items to solve challenges and survive the horrors that lie ahead. The gripping narrative unfolds as you confront the unknown, uncover dark secrets, and piece together the truth behind the events threatening to engulf the city in chaos.

Prepare for a chilling and unforgettable journey through a world teeming with mystery and danger in The Nightmare Begins.

short_description: The Nightmare Begins puts players in the role of two detectives searching for missing family members in a terrifying dream realm. They explore eerie landscapes, solve puzzles, and face supernatural threats, uncovering dark family secrets as they fight to escape this relentless nightmare
